Comment: Is it the general feeling in Florida? Because it's not what I see from here, up north.
Author: NorthenFreeman

Comment: Ironically I'm in the northeast now. I grew up in Florida but couldn't take it any longer so in my 50s I left, the nutters took it over for now.  Used to be a nice place but now it's full of crazy people.
Author: fence_sitter

Comment: I'm from Quebec, now in the west, and what I see in the news is that snowbirds are leaving because, yes, it's getting a bit crazy.
Author: NorthenFreeman

Comment: The environmental situation in Florida is also getting petty dire, most of the state is low-lying swampland and it's very exposed to hurricanes so the flood risk is massive. Even if the people were lovely I wouldn't want to own property there.
Author: pervocracy

Comment: I remember a news I've read a year or more ago... The dude got his 9mm Glock to shoot lizards on the backyard of his house.  Like WTF, obviously bullets ended up in neighbours backyard too...  I can't imagine a worst place than Florida.
Author: NorthenFreeman
